`v0.4.0`_
=========

* Add type hint stub.
* Add test configurations.

`v0.3.1`_
=========

* Add ARMT, ARM, SPARC, PPC, IA64 codes.


`v0.3.0`_
=========

* Add x86 BCJFilter class.
